data.author: Mark S

changelog.release_notes: Support added for original generation Pebble.  Added ability to turn off Bluetooth disconnect notifications.
Update to allow for the application to use a settings page hosted on Github.
Fixed issue where disabling the display of seconds would work on the emulator but not on hardware.

Added feature to allow users to disable updating of seconds.
Added settings for date formatting.
Added servo lock bluetooth connected status indicator.
Fixed white line on right side of color bars.

Version 1.0 - initial release.
Currently only supports US date format of mm-dd-yy

data.description: Anyone who worked in video back in the days of video tape recorders will instantly recognize the SMPTE color bars test pattern with the timecode window.  This watchface for the Pebble Time is designed to simulate the look of timecode with user bits as the date.  Bluetooth connection status can be monitored via the servo lock indicator on the timecode window.  Bluetooth disconnect causes the watch to vibrate.

latest_release.release_notes: Support added for original generation Pebble.  Added ability to turn off Bluetooth disconnect notifications.

data.title: Video Geek
